name: Poor Man's Sky
description:
Go out and explore a vast procedurally generated universe, find materials, explore strange lands, and maybe find life somewhere along the way.

This game is FREE, however if you would like to throw a little bit my way to show support, there is an option.

This is a VERY early version of the game, and there will be updates to it constantly so check back here for news! Or follow me on Twitter for news about the game and screenshots of what I'm working on: @spacemyname

*This Game has nothing to do with "No Man's Sky", the title is a spin off of it, however.*
